title: Bolinas Community Center and County of Marin Food Grant

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Bolinas Community Center and County of Marin Food Grant
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All email communications from "Kevin.wright@marincounty.gov" to any employee, agent, or board member of Bolinas Community Center between January 1st, 2020 to April 8th, 2025 - as well as all document attachments contained within those email communication.

All grant contracts executed between the Bolinas Community Center and the County of Marin, or any entity connected to the County of Marin. 

All invoices submitted by Bolinas Community Center to the County of Marin between January 1st, 2020 to April 8th, 2025

All reports submitted by the Bolinas Community Center to the County of Marin between January 1st, 2020 to April 8th, 2025

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson
